data.title: Peter's website
data.meta_description: ðŸ”¥HEATðŸ”¥ = Hackathon Expert | Entrepreneur | Active Alumni | Teacher
data.text:
41 Hack Viral

Mentor - Youth Development and Education Track

Aug 2020

Organised by Student Innovation for Global Health Technology (SIGHT) and HKUST Entrepreneurship Center (EC), we are looking for students and professionals to tackle problems brought on by this COVID19 pandemic!

40 Finspire Hackathon

Mentor

Feb 2020

FINSPIRE Hackathon is the premier annual event of FINSPIRE where hustlers, hackers and hipsters from universities team up to ideate, design, build and pitch their Fintech-inspired innovations. The competition is co-organized by Convoy and Cyberport. Participants have a chance to win over HK$100k in cash and prizes.

39 SmarTone Hackathon 2019 - 5G and Smart City

Finalist (one of the top-10 teams)

Oct 2019

We successfully demonstrated a 5G Mixed Reality prototype for the silver generation using smart glass. The application detects the progress and continuously prompts encouragement words from the family members. At the same time, real-time data analysis is shown.

Photo Album

38 MIT HealthHACK

Participant

Jun 2019

By participating in this event, I have learned about the basics of the hackathon process, built resilient teams, and contributed to solving challenges in aging and wellness

37 hackUST 2019

Mentor

Apr 2019

hackUST + hardUST is an annual hackathon at HKUST to develop your prototype, meet entrepreneurs and industry experts, and pitch your ideas. I actively involved in hackUST since 2014.

Photo Album

36 Data and Media Hackathon 2019

Mentor

Jan 2019

The competition attracted more than 100 participants, most of them are future journalists and tech talents. The competition matches one of the strongest areas at HKBU: Data and Media concentration.

Photo Album

35 Inter-School Innovation Competition on Insurance Technology 2018

Final-round Emcee

Nov 2018

The competition was jointly organized by Financial Services and Treasury Bureau and Cyberport Hong Kong. The organizers adopted Hackathon approach for secondary and tertiary students, with a mission to raise their awareness of insurance products and develop innovative solutions for the InsurTech industry.

Photo Album

34 AIA Life Hackathon 2018

Winner of Day 1 idea pitching award

Nov 2018

The Hackathon was organized by AIA, Microsoft Hong Kong, EY, and ThinkCol. The competition attracted over 100 participants from 12 different regions

Photo Album

33 Belt & Road Justice Challenge - Innotech Law Hackathon

Mentor

Sep 2018

The competition was organized by the Law Society of Hong Kong. I served as a mentor to help the top 10 teams, with a good mix of university students and working professionals.

32 Smart City Hackathon Hong Kong 2018

Founding Committee Member

Sep 2018

Partnered WEF Global Shapers Hong Kong and Hong Kong Science and Technology Park (HKSTP) to organize the first-ever Smart City Hackathon in Hong Kong. The competition attracted over 100 talents, including a 10-year old developer.

Photo Album

30 PolyU x Radica Big Datathon 2018

Event Emcee and General Support

May 2018

The second time to help RADICA launch Big Datathon in Hong Kong. RADICA works with different universities each time to present BigDatathon - a competition focusing on the application of big data, data analytics, and data science

29 hackUST 2018

Mentor and VIP

Apr 2018

The 5th consecutive year in hackUST. This year, I walked around and talked with participants on each table, spreading my experience in Hackathon and how to transform a prototype to a startup idea

26 CityHack 2018

Advisor

Feb 2018

Kindly received an invitation by Dr. Ray Cheung at CityU to be an advisor to give some comments to the OC team in the very early stage, and I shared some of my experience in organizing Hackathon in Hong Kong

18 Dreamcatchers MedTech Hackathon 2017

Speaker

Jun 2017

Served as an alumni speaker to share my startup journey of HabHub after the 2016 competition

9 </FinTech Hackathon> co-organized by HSBC and Deloitte

Participant

Sep 2016

Developed an innovative Virtual Reality (VR) application in FinTech theme. Although we could not win any prize, it was a wonderful experience

Photo Album

2 hackUST 2015

Organizer

Mar 2015

hackUST 2015 opened to all university students and alumni in Hong Kong. 220+ participants in 47 teams from various local universities joined the competition.

Photo Album
